member.name: M:Microsoft.UI.Xaml.Controls.ISelfPlayingAnimatedVisual.PlayAsync(System.Double,System.Double,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Starts playing the animated visual. If another play is active, that play will be stopped and this new play will replace it.
member.param: The point at which to start the animation, as a value from 0 to 1.
The point at which to finish the animation, as a value from 0 to 1.
If true, the animation will loop continuously between and . If false, the animation will play once then stop.
member.returns: An async action that is completed when the play is stopped or, if is not set, when the play reaches fromProgress.

remarks.para:
If is less than , the animated visual will play from to the end then play from the beginning until it reaches . To play an animated visual in reverse, set the
to a negative value.

member.summary: Moves the progress of the animated visual to the given value. If the animated visual was playing it will behave as if was called first.

member.name: M:Microsoft.UI.Xaml.Controls.ISelfPlayingAnimatedVisual.Stop
member.summary: Stops the current play, or does nothing if no play is underway.
member.remarks: The difference between and is that will complete the current play, whereas does not.
